info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.examples.db_collection

Class CollectionOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.examples.db_collection.CollectionOperations

  • public final class CollectionOperations
extends Object
    A set of sample operations over database collection.

      static void countByInt(IPool pool, info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.db_storage.utils.CollectionName collection)
      Counts documents in the collection by the int field using "db.collection.count" task.
